thread.title: 8 Ideas Running Should Steal from Other Sports
thread.title_full: 8 Ideas Running Should Steal from Other Sports

title: 8 Ideas Running Should Steal from Other Sports
text:
8 Ideas Running Should Steal from Other Sports A runner can dream, no? By Ted Spiker Wednesday, February 8, 2017, 10:59 am 
I have zero complaints with our sport—we all run at our own levels, we join together as a group to share in our individual pursuits, and we have a simple and elegant form of competition: Go from point A to point B as quickly as you can. 
But what if—what if!—we could adopt some rules and customs from other sports? Hmm, the possibilities:
